column1: Tizayuca is one of the 84 municipalities of Hidalgo
column2: in central-eastern Mexico. The city of Tizayuca is the municipal seat.

It is the only municipality in Hidalgo state that is officially part of the Mexico City Metropolitan Area.

column1: Tizayuca was originally a Pre-Columbian Nahua settlement in the Valley of Mexico.
